name: The Butcher's Harvest
description:
After a day of exploring and living on the ranch, Bubba the Pig beds down for the night to rest. But what he encounters every farm animal surely fears. 

Bubba is thrown into his worst nightmare: Being relentlessly chased by a crazed Butcher that's all to happy to harvest him for what he is. Trapped in a Slaughterhouse, you must find your way out.

Credits:
